member.name: T:B2R2.ROP.GadgetMap
member.summary: GadgetMap is a mapping from an offset to an ROP gadget.

member.name: T:B2R2.ROP.Gadget
member.summary: ROP gadget is a list of instructions.

member.name: T:B2R2.ROP.Tail
member.summary: Tail is a instruction sequence that needs to be placed at the end of each ROP gadget.
